title: Is AP Ezreal a thing again?
body:
Just  curious. I've seen a few AP Ezreals in my last few games, and before that I don't think I had seen one in like a year.

Side note, they both fed pretty hard.

replies.body: Its always been a good way to play ez, its just all about the skills shots, except your e

> [{quoted}](name=ThatAtheist,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=UMnpBEMB,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2014-12-21T08:57:52.290+0000)
>
> Its always been a good way to play ez, its just all about the skills shots, except your e

His E actually has good AP scaling, it's good for all in trades.
Except you have worse wave-clear than Fizz. So...enjoy being pushed to your tower while I go and roam. :P

Just need to live until you have 4 items to bring out the pain

and of course people who aren't used to playing AP Ezreal feed hard...
Been seeing a lot of him in the Poro game mode! But like others have said he sees some play especially from faker!
Faker played it recently so it immediately became the new meta
